title: Simulation-Based Learning for Improving Mental Health Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of mental health concepts
context.additional_context: Convergence education course for mathematics majors to improve awareness of mental health issues

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-life cases of mental health issues through simulation and VR environments
Learners will be able to propose three or more practical strategies to reduce stigma related to mental health
Learners can explain empathetic approaches to mental health issues based on real cases experienced by patients
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
